data.title: Debit Card Offers - Personal Banking
data.text:
Debit Card Offers

Enable your Debit Card for Online/PoS/Contactless Transactions using YONO / YONOLITE/ Internet Banking / ATM, Call to 18001234/18002100 or by visiting a branch.

Flat 10% off on Zepto using SBI Debit Card.

Coupon Code: ZEPSBIDC

Offer Period - 31st July,2024 to 7th Aug , 2024

Offer Construct:

·Flat 10% off upto ₹ 200 on orders above ₹699 on SBI Debit Card.

·Offer applicable once per user.

·Valid only on SBI Debit Card

·Offer applicable on total payable amount above ₹699(exclusive of any Zepto cash applied)

*Merchant T&C Apply

Apply for a Debit Card and Earn ₹ 500 Reward Points on your first purchase.

Offer Period - 18th July,2024 to 31st Aug , 2024

Offer Construct:

The offer would be valid for only those customers who have received the offer on their mobile number or email registered with the bank.

The Bonus Reward Points offered during the Campaign will be 500 for customers to whom Debit Card is issued during campaign period, provided they make at least one transaction using new Debit Card at point-of-sale terminals (POS) or online (e-commerce) for a minimum transaction of ₹ 500 by 30th Sep 2024.

* T&C Apply

Travel With SBI Rewardz .

1st July,2024 to 31st July , 2024

Minimum transaction to qualify to avail the campaign offer will be above Rs. 5,000/- in SBI Debit Card Spends through SBI Rewardz Portal.

5x accelerated points Maximum upto 1000 points can be awarded to the customers.

*T&C Apply

Free Zepto Pass subscription with your SBI Debit Card.

Coupon Code: SBIDCZEPTO

Offer Construct:

Free access to 2 months of Zepto Pass

Unlimited free deliveries

Up to 20% extra off on orders

Get essentials like groceries, fruits & vegetables and more delivered in minutes

*Merchant T&C Apply

Unlock the ultimate fitness deal with your SBI Debit Card on FITPASS Memberships!

Offer Valid until 31st May 2025

*Merchant T&C Apply

Mastercard offers

Business Debit Card Offers

Google Workspace - Save 25% on Business Standard plans

MediBuddy - ₹ 1/- That’s all you pay for your First Doctor Consultation!

Awfis - Get 15% discount at Awfis

FabHotels - Get flat 32% off on Bookings at FabHotels

DHL - Get 50% off on all International Shipments at DHL

Cleartax - Get up to 60% off on Business Incorporation and Compliance Service

*T&C Apply

Mastercard Priceless Specials for Diwali

Joyalukkas

The Offer is valid till 31st July 2024

Under this Offer, cardholders get 20% off on Making Charges of Gold Jewellery and Rs. 3000 off on a minimum purchase value of Rs. 50,000 & above on Diamond Jewellery

Ajio

Offer is valid till 31st March 2024

Under this Offer, Cardholders gets extra up to Rs. 1000 off on minimum order value of Rs. 2999

Offer valid only on online orders placed via http://bit.ly/3XkDum6

SweeDesi

The Offer is valid till 31st August 2024

Under this Offer, Cardholders gets 15% off on Minimum Order Value of Rs. 1100 · Offer valid only on online orders placed via https://www.sweedesi.com/

Eatfit

The Offer is valid till 29th February 2024

Under this Offer, Cardholders gets Additional 10% off on Meals · Offer valid only on online orders placed via https://www.eatfit.in/me/vouchers

Home Centre

The offer is valid till 31st March 2024

Under this offer, 1. Offer 1: Rs.5000 off on Rs.24,999 on Furniture at www.homecentre.in (Website or App). Use promo code HCMAST5K at On the payments page and pay with Mastercard. 2. Offer 2: Rs.400 off on Rs.2,999 on Homeware at www.homecentre.in (Website or App). Use promo code HCMAST400 at On the payments page and pay with Mastercard

T&C Apply

Ganesh Chaturthi Mastercard priceless offers for SBI Mastercard Debit Card holders.

SRM Sweets

Offer: Get 6% off on Total Bill

Use promocode MASTERSRM8 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card.

Link: https://srmsweets.com/online/product/assorted-ghee-sweet-box-gifting-box/.

Offer validity: 30th September 2024

My Pooja Box

Offer: Get 10% off on minimum order value of Rs. 2000

Use promocode MASTERCARD10 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card.

Link: https://www.mypoojabox.in/

Offer validity: 28th February 2024

Godavari Vantillu

Offer: Get 15% Off on entire order

Use promocode MASTER23 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card.

Link: https://www.godavarivantillu.com/

Offer validity: 17th August 2024

SweeDesi Offer

Get 15% off on Minimum Order Value of Rs. 1100

Use promocode DESIFEST15 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card. Link: https://www.sweedesi.com/

Offer validity: 31st August 2024

Ferns N Petals

Offer: Get 15% off on Minimum Order Value of Rs. 1200, Maximum off Up to Rs. 500

Use promocode MASTERCARD15 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card.

Link: https://www.fnp.com/

Offer validity: 31st May 2024

IGP Offer

Get 20% off on minimum purchase Value of Rs. 1199 at www.igp.com & Maximum discount capping Rs. 500.

Quote the promotion code IGPMC20 at checkout and pay with Mastercard card.

Offer validity: 30th Sept 2023

*T&C Apply

MasterCard Go Cashless campaign voucher

Terms & Conditions:

An active Amazon.in account is required to use this Gift Card.

The Amazon.in Gift Card is subject to the Amazon.in Terms & Conditions.

Amazon pay Gift Cards cannot be returned for a cash refund.

Amazon pay Gift Cards is valid till 3rd April 2024.

Expired eGift Cards cannot be extended, exchanged, or refunded.

Redemption Process:

On Amazon.in homepage, click on Amazon Pay and go to "Add Gift Cards".

Enter the Gift Card Code received in your email/text message and tap on Add to your balance.

Mastercard offers

Visa Card Offers

Visa International Corridor Offers

Careem

20% off capped at 15 AED per ride

BookingBash.com

Visa cardholders enjoy discounts of up to 50% off at attractions and experiences globally by activating their free BookingBash Pro membership using their eligible Visa card

Central

Get Central gift voucher worth THB 200 when spending THB 4,000 on a single sales slip.

Big Camera

5% discount plus 10% tax exemption when purchasing tax-exempt products for 5,264 yen (excluding tax) or more with your Visa card.

*Merchant T&C Apply

Visa’s Tap to Pay campaign

Make a tap to pay transaction using your Eligible Card either directly or through your mobile application for payment of at least ₹300 in a single receipt ("Tap to Pay Transaction") at any of the merchants in India ("Merchants") during the Campaign Period, to be eligible *INR 300 Amazon Shopping Voucher.

Offer Period : April 29, 2024 to October 28, 2024

*Merchant T&C Apply

Visa Top Offers

Fastrack

Get flat 10% off at Fastrack

Myntra

Additional 10% OFF up to INR 300 on min. cart value of INR 999

Behrouz Biryani

Get 30% Off upto Rs 125/- on orders above Rs 249/-

Kidzania

Flat 10% Off on online advance bookings at Kidzania

Redcliffe Labs

FLAT 25% OFF on all health checkup packages across Redcliffe web and App

Ease my Trip

Get discount upto Rs. 800 on domestic flights on a minimum booking of Rs. 3500

T&C Apply
